newsitem.title: USA: TABLE-SBC Communications Inc Q2 net loss.
newsitem.headline: TABLE-SBC Communications Inc Q2 net loss.

text.p: (All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTES: Q2 1997 results include $1.6 billion in charges related to merging with Pacific Telesis and to cover the impact of several federal and state regulatory rulings.
Excluding these charges, Q2 1997 operating earnings were $0.90 per share compared to $0.87 a year ago. The $0.90 per share compares to the First Call consensus estimate of $0.91.

The $1.6 billion in charges include $213 million to cover post-employment benefits and closing of duplicative operations and $667 million to write down selected wireless digital, analog, rural, wireless and intrabuilding equipment and operations.

The charges also consist of $438 million to halt certain video and broadband efforts, a $176 million ratepayer rebate for the PacTel merger, $16 million to implement number portability requirements and $101 million of other regulatory rulings.
